Original Petition filed under Section 34 of the Arbitration and
Conciliation Act, 1996, to set aside the award dated 25.04.2013 passed by the
second respondent pertaining to the dispute between the petitioner and the
first respondent in Arbitration Case No.R/S.S.A.F/10 of 2012.
